amendment.description: Amendment provides eviction and privacy protection for victims of domestic violence who live in section 8 housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-227 to require that public housing agencies selected for participation in the Housing Innovation Program must comply with voucher and public housing domestic violence provisions from the Violence Against Women Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
